title: Gilani condoles demise of U.S. Congresswoman Sheila Jackson Lee
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 20 (APP): Chairman Senate Syed Yousaf Raza Gilani has expressed deep sense of grief and sorrow over the demise of U.S. Congresswoman Sheila Jackson Lee.
In his message he said, she was a great friend and supporter of Pakistan.
He expressed solidarity with family of Sheila Jackson and said that Pakistan has lost a true friend.
Her services for oppressed, the Chairman Senate said, would long be remembered.
